name: Defuse Bomb & nobody explodes! (plus VR)
description:
This game is inspired by "Keep talking and nobody explodes!".

Defuse a randomly generated bomb in the shortest amount of time using instructions provided in a task pad. Can you defuse the bomb on time !?

...

Game Features

1. Each game will be different

Randomly generated bomb meaning all panel values will be randomized on every new play!

2. Additional VR game mode

Default game mode is a single-screen keyboard & mouse experience but also comes with a VR mode!

3. Task pad with Quick access feature

Unlike the original game, which required more than 1 person, you can play this game solo thanks to a quickly accessible task pad.

4. Three levels of difficulty

You can choose how hard you want this game to be.

Time - Easy: 3 minutes, Medium: 2 minutes, Hard: 60 seconds.

Note: VR mode may contain some bugs since I created the game using Unity's XR device simulator.

...

Side Note

Why a rip-off (directly taking art or gameplay inspiration from an already existing popular VR game)?

Ans: I made this game as a final project submission for a Unity course (Create with VR) which had the following criteria:

"Your game should be a small clone of some VR experience (with a unique twist)".

Twist: original game was a party (more than 1 player) game, this one can be played by a single person.

...
